sentences.sContent: But the towboat did look good. So did a sailing boat, packed with friends.
sentences.sContent_eng: But the towboat did look good. So did a sailing boat, packed with friends.
sentences.sCn: 但是拖船看起来确实不错，还有一艘乘满了朋友的帆船。

sentences.sContent: I am on a sailing boat of 18 metres.
sentences.sContent_eng: I am on a sailing boat of 18 metres.

sentences.sContent: "Hydroptere," currently the world's fastest sailing boat, gets its speed from foils, or underwater "wings" that lift the boat and enable it to "fly" several meters above the water.
sentences.sContent_eng: "Hydroptere," currently the world's fastest sailing boat, gets its speed from foils, or underwater "wings" that lift the boat and enable it to "fly" several meters above the water.
sentences.sCn: “Hydroptere”，目前世界上最快的帆船，它的速度来源于船底的薄片，或者说是它的”海洋之翼“，将船身托起，使它能“飞行”在水面数米之上。

trans.tranOther: a small boat with one or more sails
